mapper.select: select password from user where name = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into user (name, password, gmt_create, salt, account_type, email, phone, avatar_url, token) values (#{name}, #{password}, #{gmtCreate}, #{salt}, #{accountType}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{avatarUrl}, #{token})
mapper.select: select count(*) from user as a inner join user_follower as uf where a.id = #{id} and a.id = uf.uid
select count(*) from user as a inner join user_follower as uf where a.id = #{id} and a.id = uf.fid
select count(*) from user as a inner join question as q where a.id = #{id} and a.id = q.creator
select a.id, a.`name`, a.phone, a.email, a.avatar_url from user_follower as uf join user as a where uf.uid = #{id} and uf.fid = a.id
select a.id, a.`name`, a.phone, a.email, a.avatar_url from user_follower as uf join user as a where uf.fid = #{id} and uf.uid = a.id
select a.id, a.`name`, a.phone, a.email, a.avatar_url from user a where id = #{id}
select count(*) from user_follower as u where u.uid = #{uid} and u.fid = #{fid}
